page.title: 06Village Amenities
page.content: floor so that you can go in wearing your wellies. Nearly half the children at { {Yattendon School}live in Frilsham. There used to be a school there until 1951 but then it was closed and a bus was provided to take the children to Yattendon. Then the bus was taken away, so nowadays most children come by car and the Mums take it in turns to drive. There aren't any shops in Frilsham and only three in Yattendon, four if you count the hairdresser's. They are the Post Office, The Butcher and the old Post Office which just sells sweets. Most families go shopping in Sava Centre in Theale because it's easier to park there than in Newbury. Hampstead Norris only has one shop, the Post Office and general store.
